misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The code directly specifies the algorithm to be used without considering the strength or security level of the algorithm. This can lead to the selection of a less-secure or outdated algorithm.
recommendation: Instead of hardcoding the algorithm name, use a secure algorithm selection mechanism and consider using algorithms from a known, reputable provider like the Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) standard algorithms.
